content.html: Hi Carol, Hope this message finds you well. I heard about the new words page project you're working on for the site and I've been on and I can see it's not yet live. Any idea when we can get this boxed off? Thanks, Andrew Seward Senior Product Strategist carol.gg
content.value:
Hi Carol,
Hope this message finds you well.
I heard about the new words page project you're working on for the site and I've been on and I can see it's not yet live.
Any idea when we can get this boxed off?

Thanks,
Andrew Seward
Senior Product Strategist
carol.gg
